text:
Shahid gets 4 mn Instagram fans

Shahid Kapoor now has a following of four million followers on Instagram.

“4 million. Thank you, thank you, thank you,” Shahid wrote, posting a picture of himself.

Shahid is currently preparing for Udta Punjab an upcoming neo-noir drama thriller directed by Abhishek Chaubey. — IANS
title: Shahid Kapoor has four million Instagram followers
